==German== ===Etymology=== From {{af|de|an-|Rede}} or from {{m|de|anreden}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈanˌʀeːdə/}} * {{audio|de|De-Anrede.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Anreden}} # [[address]], [[salutation]], form of address # a (short) speech to someone ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|speech}} {{l|de|Ansprache}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
